home.title: I'm JISHNU
home.subtitle: “ Standing on the shoulders of early innovators in electronics to reach for a future of bio-integrated devices. ”

about.description: “ I am a dedicated Applied Electronics and Instrumentation student at Government Engineering College, Kozhikode (GECK), with a passion for bridging the gap between hardware and software. My work is driven by a desire to create innovative solutions for real-world problems. I've engineered a smart door lock system with facial recognition and am currently developing a drone-based vehicle detection system. I am constantly exploring new technologies to build meaningful and efficient tech experiences. ”

contact.description: Curious about something or want to team up? Say hi!
